about_the_game:
Dive into the captivating world of Aureole - Wings of Hope with our demo, offering a sneak peek into the celestial adventure that awaits in the full game. In this demo, players are introduced to the gripping narrative of Ramila and Ryleth, angelic heroes determined to free their heavenly kingdom from evil demons.

The demo provides a substantial experience, including three levels on each of the two distinct paths - the Sacred and Demonic Path. You'll get a taste of the heart-pounding platforming action that defines Aureole - Wings of Hope, all while mastering precise physics-based controls. Every jump and movement counts in these challenging environments.

Features


  • A unique platforming experience
  • Two distinct paths: Sacred and Demonic
  • Three diverse levels on each path in different biomes
